title: In These Six 'Wild Tales,' Humans Morph Into Destructive Forces Of Nature
teaser: The Argentinean film co-produced by Pedro Almodovar is up for an Oscar for best foreign language film. It features a drunk teenager who runs over a woman and an angry bride at a glitzy Jewish wedding.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
